data.text:
NOTE: Content only available in the United States and Puerto Rico

Join the movement! The TheaterEars app allows you to watch new release films at the movie theater in Spanish. Simply load the app select your movie, showtime and language to get the movie track on your phone. When you arrive at the movietheater, TheaterEars will sync to the movie through your phone's microphone and then play the full movie soundtrack in your chosen language. For millions, cine en EspaÃ±ol, is now within reach without the barriers of language.

â¢ THOUSANDS OF THEATERS AVAILABLE (United States & Puerto Rico): TheaterEars is available in thousands of movie theaters nationwide. Simply select your date, movie theater, and showtime and youâll be ready to use TheaterEars.

â¢ ADVANCED RESERVATIONS: Want to make sure that you donât miss out on your favorite upcoming movie? With TheaterEars you can reserve your movie before it comes out (on selected titles). Youâll automatically be notified when the movie is available for you in our area.

â¢ AT HOME SHOWTIMES: Selected movies will be available for at home use.

â¢ ALL FORMATS: Use TheaterEars for all standard movies plus all premium formats such as IMAX, RealD, 3D, XD, Dolby Cinema, and more.

â¢ EASY TO CHANGE SHOWTIME: Change of plans? No problem. Change your movie showtime directly on the app anytime before showtime.

â¢ MULTI-LANGUAGE SUPPORT: Need support in Englishâ¦en EspaÃ±ol? No problem. TheaterEars interfaces with its users in both English and Spanish.

â¢ RATE & SHARE YOUR FAVORITE MOVIES: Love a movie? You can show your love by rating it on the TheaterEars app. Then you can share your ratings with friends on social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram).

â¢ MOVIE DESCRIPTIONS: Learn more about upcoming and current movies, access the movie summary, actors, and more on the TheaterEars app.

Hundreds of Thousands have used TheaterEars to watch great movies such as F9, Avengers: Endgame, Joker, Coco, and more. TheaterEars is always adding new movies, so stay tuned for updates.

Xandra huh ,

Awesome

Went to try this app the other day before recommending it to my mom and it worked great! Watched Solo and it synced perfectly, never buffered or stopped. I was worried that I wouldnât hear over the loud movie sound but I did- in fact I couldnât hear the English version in background and thereâs no need to, as the audio track contains everything, not just dialogue. I was worried other ppl would be able to hear the sound from my earphones, but that didnât happen either. I took off my earphones a couple of times at different volumes to check and nothing. I was also pleased to hear LA Spanish as opposed to the Spain accent I had heard previously in a video advertising this app (nothing wrong with it, my accent just happens to be LA) anyway. Iâm looking forward to more movie and language options! As a polyglot, Iâd definitely appreciate the fun option to hear my favorite movies in different languages! Great job so far :)

Actually one question: why do we need to âdownload the trackâ every time? Canât we just do it once and then unlock it by choosing the movie showtime or something? I kept changing plans and while at home it downloaded in seconds, when I did it at the theater before the movie it took around 10mins. Not a deal breaker because I was early just something that could be better.
